name: code-notes-search
title: Search my Code Notes with Algolia
description: This extension allows to search through an Algolia index directly from Raycast.
author: mrmartineau

commands.name: index
commands.title: Code Notes Search
commands.description: Search through an Algolia index directly from Raycast.

preferences.name: baseUrl
preferences.title: URL for your code notes site
preferences.description: This will prefix the `url` attribute of your records.

preferences.name: appId
preferences.title: Algolia Application ID
preferences.description: You can find your Application ID from the Algolia Dashboard.

preferences.name: indexName
preferences.title: Algolia Index Name
preferences.description: Specify the Algolia Index you want to search on.

preferences.name: apiKey
preferences.title: Algolia Search API Key
preferences.description: You can find your Search API Key from the Algolia Dashboard.
